trans-unit.source: Represents a group of user-scoped application settings in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示配置文件中用户范围的应用程序设置组。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] contains a single default settings provider, <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>, which stores configuration data to the local file system in files with the extension `.config`.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]包含一个默认设置提供程序， <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>，它在带有扩展名的文件存储到本地文件系统的配置数据`.config`。

trans-unit.source: The contents of configuration files are structured as XML documents.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的内容组织为 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: User-scoped settings are persisted in a file with the name `username.config`.
trans-unit.target: 用户范围设置具有名称的文件中保留`username.config`。

trans-unit.source: Within this file, data is stored as elements within a `<userSettings>` section.
trans-unit.target: 在此文件中，数据存储中的元素为`<userSettings>`部分。

trans-unit.source: Each of these sections is represented by a corresponding <xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection>.
Each section object is owned and administered by a configuration section handler, which is an <xref:System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler>.
trans-unit.target: 每个节对象拥有和管理一个配置节处理程序，这是通过<xref:System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection> class represents a simple extension of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class, which is used in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] support for general configuration files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection>类表示的简单的扩展名<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>类，该类用于在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]支持常规配置文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about application settings, see the topic [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅主题[应用程序设置 Windows 窗体](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes the <xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection.Settings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection.%23ctor%2A>构造函数初始化<xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection.Settings%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of client settings for the section.
trans-unit.target: 获取节中的客户端设置的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingElementCollection" /> containing all the client settings found in the current configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 包含在当前配置节中找到的所有客户端设置的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection.Settings%2A> property is itself a configuration property.
